text: Learn from others, don't copy others. There's a big difference between the two in a lot of traders just try to replicate what they see because they think it's successful. But they actually don't know how to deploy the strategies themselves, take the time to learn your own stuff.

metadata.title: Learn from, DON’T copy other traders
metadata.description:
Learning from other traders can significantly decrease our learning curve and imbue knowledge distilled from extended periods of learning. There's a distinct difference between learning from and copying others. Don't COPY other traders, you just hurt yourself. 

##trading #money #trader #investing  #investment #stockmarket #business #invest #investor #success #trade
